Token.Abstract: Objects acting as the delegate for RKObjectMappingOperation objects must adopt the RKObjectMappingOperationDelegate protocol. These methods enable the delegate to be notified of events such as the application of attribute and relationship mappings during a mapping operation.
Tells the delegate that an attribute or relationship mapping was found for a given key path within the data being mapped.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKObjectAttributeMapping or RKObjectRelationshipMapping found for the key path.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the source object for which the mapping is to be applied.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that no attribute or relationships mapping was found for a given key path within the data being mapped.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the source object for which no mapping was found.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has set a value for a given key path with an attribute or relationship mapping.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: A new value that was set on the destination object.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the destination object for which a new value has been set.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKObjectAttributeMapping or RKObjectRelationshipMapping found for the key path.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the mapping operation has declined to set a value for a given key path because the value has not changed.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation being performed.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: A unchanged value for the key path in the destination object.

Parameter.Name: keyPath
Parameter.Abstract: The key path in the destination object for which a unchanged value was not set.

Parameter.Name: mapping
Parameter.Abstract: The RKObjectAttributeMapping or RKObjectRelationshipMapping found for the key path.

Token.Abstract: Tells the delegate that the object mapping operation has failed due to an error.

Parameter.Name: operation
Parameter.Abstract: The object mapping operation that has failed.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: An error object indicating the reason for the failure.
